name: Core
rules: The Eidolon’s core has no shards. Any shards on the field when this layer is revealed are immediately vaporized, destroyed in the blink of an eye. Once the core is destroyed, the Eidolon is defeated.

features.name: Pulsing Core
features.effect: This layer is Size 1/2 and has 1 HP.
